resources.string: Cannot connect to local Orbot proxy: %s

Orbot proxy is not available.

This application uses it to access servers. If you have not installed it yet, please install it now.
It is available on Market as:
Orbot: Tor on Android 

If it is already installed, please start and activate it.
Please enter your password to unlock chat.

This is first time this chat is used. You need to choose a password and type it twice. Your password must be at least %d chars long\n\nMake sure you remember the password or you will not be able to access your accounts. No password recovery options are available.
Password must be at least %d characters long.
Password has been set. Will generate keys after you press OK. This might take a while...
Please choose or enter a server. Server can be added manually or QR code of server can be scanned.
Generating public/private key pair for new account on %1$s:%2$d
Please choose identity to export. If no identity is listed, create account first. Click on identity will launch QR code generation, long click will copy URL to clipboard.
Identity URL has been saved to clipboard.
Please choose or create account to add this contact to.
Failed to receive contact information from server.
You have already added this contact: %s.
ERROR: Received message timestamp was smaller or equal to last received. Possible replay attack!
Session is not established, no forward secrecy. Both parties must send a message to complete ECDH.
Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
Failed to add contact. Please try again.
You have new Tor message, but there is no connection to Tor network or server is unreachable.
You have new Tor message, please log in.

Tor is not running.

Gentian now supports Tor messaging. Download Orbot from Google Play and connect to Tor network to use this feature.

Do you want to install Orbot?
You must have Orbot installed and activated to proxy traffic through it. Would you like to install it from Google Play?
Orbot doesn\'t appear to be running. Would you like to start it up and connect to Tor?
